Text: First bad torrent I got with flawl3ss name on it.  There is no sound, and the movie would not play in vlc, divx player or windows media.  Download twice with no luck.

Ignore the previous comment, there's nothing wrong with this AVI, the sound is working perfectly and you can play it with vlc. Fix your computer before flaming a release.
Awesome picture quality, sound is great too, thanks a lot.
